metadata.Title: CVE-2021-30516 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Heap buffer overflow in History in Google Chrome prior to 90.0.4430.212allowed a remote attacker who had compromised the renderer process topotentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
